text.231_Daf, 0_Line: She implied that they even lost their virility
text.231_Daf, 6_Line: At the age of fifty, she converted end said
text.231_Daf, 7_Line: May I make repentance by the merit of the cord, the window, and the flax.
text.231_Daf, 5_Line: Rahav was ten years old when Israel left Egypt, and she whored herself for forty years while the Israelites wandered the wilderness.
text.231_Daf, 3_Line: There wasn't a prince or king who didn't come to Rahav the prostitute
